body_html:
Regarding your item (3), I suppose you mean downgrade instead of upgrade? In the API documentation for 1.2.x it doesn't appear prepare_attention went beyond 1.0 ...

I was used to seeing deprecated labels next to the old functions and was completely oblivious to the fact I was looking at 1.0 API documentation. Apparently the tensorflow technical writers aren't bothering with that anymore perhaps ...

Anyway, thank you!

body:
Regarding your item (3), I suppose you mean downgrade instead of upgrade? In the API documentation for `1.2.x` it doesn't appear `prepare_attention` went beyond `1.0` ... 

I was used to seeing `deprecated` labels next to the old functions and was completely oblivious to the fact I was looking at `1.0` API documentation. Apparently the tensorflow technical writers aren't bothering with that anymore perhaps ...

Anyway, thank you!
